channel.title: Jar and signing on ubuntu
channel.description: I have the jar maker and know how to do it on windows but i can't figure out how to do it on ubuntu (i installed ubuntu the other day and i am wanting to create a webclient.) Using wine to run it does not work. if someone could give me a link to a page that tells me how to or i could send you the client to jar and sign.

item.title: Jar and signing on ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

siden:

I have the jar maker and know how to do it on windows but i can’t figure out how to do it on ubuntu (i installed ubuntu the other day and i am wanting to create a webclient.) Using wine to run it does not work. if someone could give me a link to a page that tells me how to or i could send you the client to jar and sign.

Use the command line.
